pages.text: The Arcing Orb allows its wearer to dodge at the cost of 30 mana by pressing a movement key twice. By holding the Arcing Orb: Attack key, you can charge up an attack which deals more damage the longer you charge it. Charging the Arcing Orb for longer durations costs more mana.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+10%$() Movement Speed$(br2)$(l)Mod Compatibility:$()$(br)$(n)Lycanites$(): Immunity to the stunned potion effect$(br)$(n)Elenai Dodge 1$(): Dodging is handled by Elenai Dodge and not the arcing orb, lightning effect still triggers when dodging
